definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: conception, pregnancy;—´[[ה]] abs. Ho 9:11, Ru 4:13; sf. [[הֵרׂנֵח]] Ge 3:16, either contr., so Ew:§ 214 a, or erron. for [[הריונך]] which stands in Sam. cf. Di;—conception, in combin. [[מִלֵּדָה וּמִבֶּטֶן וּמֵהֵרָי֑וֹן]] Ho 9:11; [[וַתֵּלֶד]] ´[[לָהּ ה]] ´[[וַיִּתֵּן י]] Ru 4:13; [[עִצְּבוֹנֵח וְהֵרׂנֵח]] Ge 3:16 (‖[[תֵּלְדִי]]).
